price: 167. Ceux qui ont mécru dressant des obstacles devant le chemin d’Allah sont allés loin dans l’égarement.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ قَدۡ ضَلُّواْ ضَلَٰلَۢا بَعِيدًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi qad ḍallū ḍalālan baʿīdan
